alert.note: Alert for Central Penobscot; Central Piscataquis; Northern Washington; Southern Piscataquis (Maine) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 20 at 3:52AM EST until January 20 at 5:00PM EST by NWS Caribou
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 PM EST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations between 3 and 6 inches. * WHERE...Central Piscataquis, Southern Piscataquis, Northern Washington, and Central Penobscot Counties. * WHEN...Until 5 PM EST this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the Friday morning and evening commutes.
info.instruction: A Winter Weather Advisory for snow means periods of snow will cause primarily travel difficulties. Expect snow covered roads and limited visibilities, and use caution while driving. The latest road conditions for Maine can be obtained by going to newengland511.org.

area.areaDesc: Central Penobscot; Central Piscataquis; Northern Washington; Southern Piscataquis
